评论概述: Dickies have tanked in quality and lasting ability in recent years.
评论详情: I used to be a big fan of Dickies carpenter pants for their (former) long lasting durability. Sadly however it seems in recent years that Dickies has gone for the cheapest manufacturing possible, and shattered the durability of their products as every pair I have ordered in recent months had began ripping at the crotch and knees after a few weeks of regular use. I have tried different sizes but it seems like it is an issue with their manufacturing quality. I cannot recommend Dickies anymore, and will be looking for a better quality brand of work pants as I am tired of having to replace them so often. Pictured - a pair I've had for only a couple of months that I have had to patch over tears repeatedly.
"I am extremely pleased, and if I could, I would purchase one in every style."
Fits well, heavy duty material, washes nicely. No complaints at all!
These pants were purchased for work. They are perfect. However the first pair arrived and the pocket was sewn shut. So it did have to be sent back and a new pair reordered.

The pants fit great and look sleek. The only problem are the pockets, they slant too much. When you sit keys and change slip out. Material is lighter than other designs and more relaxed but still strong.

My husband loves these pants. They are the only pants he will wear for work. They last for about 6-8 months before they start to wear in certain places. The color obviously fades but the are not for fashion so it’s not an issue. They are super durable.

Overall, these have become my everyday pants.  I wanted something slim fitting with a more traditional pant/jean cut and these fit and flex really well.  Like other reviewers mention, the fabric is soft and relatively lightweight compared to something like Carhartt duck fabric.  You will wear through these pretty fast if you're doing anything that looks like work.The right-thigh pockets are the killer feature here and cannot be understated how excellent the pocket is designed.  Personally, I can't stand carrying phones in one of the usual four pants pockets.  And cargo pockets are shaped improperly to hold a phone.  The main right-thigh pocket is great for any size phone.  It is also partially closed on the top creating an angled entry.  This means your phone won't slip out when you're sitting slightly reclined (unlike far more expensive pants with a similar pocket location).  The smaller right-thigh pocket is perfect for pencils and markers and makes them easy to reach while you're laying out cuts.The one thing that keeps these from replacing basically 80% of the pants in my closet is the hammer loop.  I've looked at literally every Dickies pants to see if I can get the the same style without the hammer loop and it doesn't exist.  Without the hammer loop (that is probably useful to like 2% of tradesman anyway), these could even be worn as business casual.  These would be the ideal travel pants: comfy on the airplane, barely dressy enough for a business meeting, and tough enough on the job site.Dickies: Please make these exact same pants without the hammer loop and I'll make a lifetime purchase to account for replacing these as they wear out :)

评论概述: Awesome pants. Take a beating. Better than Carhartt.
评论详情: I’m on my 10th pair of these. I’m really hard on them ant work ans a commercial glazier, and I can get about two years before I blow them out, thanks to the FLEX! And the nice thing about them, you’ll notice a small hole slowly start to blow out in the crotch so you know you need to order more once it starts. I usually wait until the hole is the size of a quarter before I retire them into cut off shorts, which can be several wears and washes.  Carhartts only last about 6 months for me before I blow them out in the crotch, and for me, when they blow, it’s out of nowhere and your shorts or butt cheeks are hangin out until you can double up tape from the inside to outside against eachother over the hole.  Love these dickies, but this last pair I ordered, the lighter tan color, came as ripstop material rather than flex duck material for some reason. So I’ll be returning or exchanging them.

评论概述: Superior Durability and Functionality: Dickies Men's Tough Max Duck Carpenter Pant Review
评论详情: As a tradesman in need of exceptional workwear, I recently invested in the Dickies Men's Tough Max Duck Carpenter Pant, and I am thoroughly impressed by its outstanding durability and functionality. This rugged masterpiece from Dickies, a trusted brand in workwear, has revolutionized my work attire and has proven to be a reliable companion in demanding and challenging environments.  Constructed with Tough Max technology, these carpenter pants are built to withstand the harshest conditions. The heavy-duty 10-ounce cotton duck fabric not only exhibits remarkable resistance to tears and abrasions but also provides excellent wind and water resistance. Consequently, these pants demonstrate an impressive longevity that ensures the investment is not only upheld but surpassed.  The Dickies Men's Tough Max Duck Carpenter Pant features a roomy, relaxed fit that guarantees unhindered mobility during active work. The gusseted crotch further enhances freedom of movement, enabling me to engage in various physical tasks without any discomfort or constraint. Whether climbing ladders, bending, or kneeling, these pants offer the utmost flexibility and agility, allowing me to perform my job with ease and efficiency.  One of the standout features of these pants is the functional utility pockets. With a total of 7 pockets, including multipurpose tool pockets, hammer loops, and reinforced back pockets, they provide ample storage space for all my essential work tools. Each pocket is thoughtfully designed and strategically placed to ensure easy access and secure storage. The reinforced stitching guarantees the long-term durability of these pockets, ensuring they withstand frequent use and abrasion.  Equipped with a traditional carpenter-style design, these pants boast a double-knee construction reinforced with an abrasion-resistant overlay. This heavy-duty reinforcement offers exceptional protection, making them ideal for demanding work environments prone to extra wear and tear. The heavy-duty brass zipper closure and shank button provide a secure fastening, ensuring the pants remain in place even during the most rigorous activities.  The Dickies Men's Tough Max Duck Carpenter Pant's impeccable fit and sturdy construction are complemented by its aesthetic appeal. The timeless design, available in various classic colors, effortlessly combines style with practicality. This versatility allows these pants to seamlessly transition from the worksite to casual outings, enhancing their value as a reliable wardrobe staple.  Lastly, the pants are designed with easy care in mind. They are machine washable, allowing for convenient maintenance without compromising their exceptional quality or colorfastness.  In conclusion, the Dickies Men's Tough Max Duck Carpenter Pant surpasses expectations in terms of durability, functionality, and style. Its rugged construction, reinforced design, and reliable Tough Max technology make it the ultimate workwear essential. Whether facing challenging worksites or simply seeking durability and comfort, these pants are an investment that guarantees satisfaction and longevity.  Note: Product purchased from authorized seller.
